about.label: About Us
about.title: A Home for Rest and Enjoyment
about.description: Panorama House Aljmaš is a family-run property that combines comfort, nature, and peace. Situated on a hill above the Danube, our home offers a unique panoramic view that takes your breath away. Enjoy the private pool, jacuzzi, and sauna, and experience rural tourism with a touch of luxury.
about.imageAlt: Panorama House Aljmaš with panoramic Danube view
about.description2:
Enjoy the private pool, jacuzzi, and sauna, surrounded by greenery and tranquility. Spacious and bright rooms, a modern equipped kitchen, and a comfortable living room create a sense of home and coziness.

With capacity for 5+2 guests, Panorama House is ideal for a family vacation, weekend with friends, or romantic nature escape. On the outdoor terrace with barbecue, you can spend unforgettable moments watching the sunset with breathtaking views.
highlights: Close to cultural and natural attractions of Aljmaš and surroundings
about.experienceText1: At Panorama House, we believe true luxury lies in peace, comfort, and warm hospitality. Every corner is carefully designed so you feel relaxed and special from the first moment.
about.experienceText2:
Indulge in the jacuzzi or sauna, cool down in the pool, and enjoy the breathtaking Danube view. When you wish to explore the surroundings, bicycles are available for leisurely rides through nature, and nearby await the beauties of Aljmaš, local wineries, and cultural landmarks.

Panorama House – where elegance meets the warmth of home and every stay becomes a memory.

location.label: Location
location.title: Aljmaš and Surroundings
location.description: Nestled in the far east of Croatia, Aljmaš is a peaceful settlement on the right bank of the Danube, near Osijek. The surroundings captivate with untouched nature, ideal for walks, cycling, and fishing. Nearby you'll find local restaurants with traditional Slavonian cuisine, and cultural and religious landmarks that make every stay special. The municipality of Erdut, to which Aljmaš belongs, also offers wine routes, nature reserves, and a diverse range of events. Visit Aljmaš and return to the comfort of Panorama House — your home away from home.
